resources.string:
New in 2.2

  • New: App translated to German (Germany) (thanks to Alexander Fischer).
  • New: Weekdays added to notification settings.
  • New: Notifications moved to main menu. Independent settings for location + event.
  • Fixed: Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements.
  • A big thanks to all of you who have rated the app, joined beta testing group, offered suggestions and sent crash reports.
    Your support is much appreciated!
Join beta testing group to get new features before they\'re released.
Go to Menu => Support this project to join the group.

Coming next in v2.3:
  • Alarms.

New in 2.1

  • New: Widgets.
  • Fixed: Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements.

New in 2.0

  • New: Option to switch map to satellite view.
  • New: Time format setting (12-hour or 24-hour).
  • New: Coordinates format setting.
  • New: Now you can set the ringtone as a notification sound.
  • Improved: Current location mode.
  • Improved: Notifications.
  • Improved: User interface.
  • Improved: Timezone database updated.
  • Fixed: Disable all notifications is working now.
  • Fixed: Notifications on Android 7.
  • Fixed: Known bugs fixed, new bugs added.
Coming next in v2.1:
  • Widgets.

New in 1.2

  • New: Notifications. You are now able to set notifications for upcoming sunrises, sunsets or golden hours.
    To enable notifications go to Settings, check Notification checkbox and tap on Locations.
    Optionally you can change notification\'s sound, vibration pattern and LED light (on supported devices).
  • New: Country name added to location\'s properties (for newly added locations).
  • Improved: User interface.
  • Improved: Timezone database updated.
  • New: Change log added.
  • Fixed: Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements.

New in 1.1

  • New: Map mode added.
  • Improved: Android 6 (Marshmallow) support added.
  • Improved: Timezone database updated.
  • Fixed: Bug fixes and miscellaneous improvements.
